title: PaperCut NG External User Lookup Code Injection Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of PaperCut NG. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the External User Lookup functionality. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of a user-supplied string before using it to execute Java code. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: PaperCut has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://www.papercut.com/kb/Main/SecurityBulletinJuly2023/
timeline:
2023-06-07 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2023-08-30 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2023-09-07 - Advisory Updated
